        public Update set(String key,
                  Object value)
        从类复制的说明: Update
        Update using the $set update modifier
        覆盖:
        set 在类中 Update
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        value - can be null. In this case the property remains in the db with a null value. To remove it use Update.unset(String).
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Update operator: $set

      • pushAll

        @Deprecated
public Update pushAll(String key,
                                  Object[] values)
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: Update
        Update using the $pushAll update modifier.
        Note: In MongoDB 2.4 the usage of $pushAll has been deprecated in favor of $push $each. Important: As of MongoDB 3.6 $pushAll is not longer supported. Use $push $each instead. Update.push(String)) returns a builder that can be used to populate the $each object.
        覆盖:
        pushAll 在类中 Update
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        values - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Update operator: $pushAll
